website_summaries.verdict: A specially contoured heating pad from a respected maker that relaxes the entire neck and shoulder region.
pros: Excellent for those with shoulder tension
Soft outer pad is comforting and luxurious
Heats quickly, and there is a moist heat option
cons: Some report a strong chemical smell when first opening the package

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell, NO warmth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help relieve neck issues. When I got it I noticed a terrible and overwhelming chemical smell, it was really bad. I plugged it in and it only heated up in the center, and on then barely so. While it is a heavy material, which is nice, it gave off virtually no warmth. have nine dollar heating pads from the store that work better in terms of heating up, but this just didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made heating pad and it fits securely around my shoulders. It has a high neck on it that is heated through out. The fabric is soft and thick enough that you don't feel the wires through it. It has a very long cord which is very continent.
customer_reviews.author: Vic and Beth

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The two hour auto shut off is really inconvenient, and most reviews remarked on how hot it gets even on the lowest setting. I must have a defective one because even on high it is not sufficient. I always read the reviews and base my purchase decision on the feedback, which I thought this was a perfect fit for me. I am terribly disappointed there are no returns also. Lot of money to waste on a sub par product. Mine is not a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mom & Pop of the Groom

customer_reviews.title: This PRIME item is UNRETURNABLE by SKUniverse!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money!! This item from SKUniverse is UNRETURNABLE!! Thought everything under "Prime" was returnable, NOT!!! This does not heat up enough, should have listened to the reviews, don't know why everyone else thought his was so wonderful. It is nothing like the ones you heat in the Microwave for 2 minutes or other heating pads I had in the past. Having a fleece blanket over my shoulders is just as effective....$32.99 down the drain. Go to a retail store & try it before you buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware-not returnable
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! If you buy this you are stuck, it's SMALL and looks nothing like the thing draped on the lady in the picture. I don't like it and would return it if I could. It's really important to check the return policy before you hit the send button! How about if this didn't work? Stuck. I sure wish they would state this up front in BIG letters, older folks have a harder time with this stuff. What good are the stupid magnets and what is all the rock stuff?? When it gets hot it stinks! This is going to thrift store...yuck. I would not believe the glowing reviews, shame on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bexyhoney

customer_reviews.title: Warms up quickly then like others said after 10/15 minutes it cools down slightly
customer_reviews.text: Warms up quickly then like others said after 10/15 minutes it cools down slightly. You don't have to turn it off and then back on for it to get warmer it will warm back up on it's own after a couple minutes. Be careful, after a couple weeks of use on high the back of my mothers neck was burnt. We are talking skin is now peeling. She didn't notice or feel the burn till the skin was peeling so you should check the back of your neck after each use to make sure your not overdoing it. Overall she very satisfied, neck feels a lot better overall.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I am not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I give this heating pad one star for its softness. Other than that I am not happy with this purchase. First it does not get hot enough! On the highest setting it gives me little or no relief. Second I purchased this item for a neck problem. The part that touches my neck is cooler than the shoulder pad which as I said isn't hot enough therefore doesn't help me in the least! Thirdly it doesn't stay put unless I hold it in place. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Langella

customer_reviews.title: Most complete neck coverage product
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly around my neck and shoulder muscles. It is weighted around the hem and has a comfortable magnetic closure to secure it in position. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Willteach

customer_reviews.title: Heating is sub-par; poor cord design
customer_reviews.text: Heating is sub-par. The high setting is equal to the low setting on the Sunbeam 732-500 King Size Heating Pad with UltraHeatTechnology, purchased on Amazon. Another issue is the huge cord plug-in at the upper edge of this unit is uncomfortably at your shoulder; a design mistake. It does fit reasonably well on small shoulders. The magnetic closure works only on a small neck circumference.
customer_reviews.author: do_2

customer_reviews.title: Small, Uncomfortable and Not Very Hot
customer_reviews.text: Tight around neck and shoulders (and I'm a petite woman) Doesn't get very hot and heat isn't consistent (but better heat than others I've tried) Big, old school cord connector hangs off it and gets in the way (almost rests on my chest) Small - doesn't go far down back (not nearly as big as the picture makes it look) *Main reason I'm returning: Hem along the edge is filled with crunchy bits of hard, bean-like material that hits in the middle of my back and is VERY uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: Heat is barely warm.
customer_reviews.text: Does not get warm. Does not have a magnetic closure, and almost two inches smaller than the one ordered last week. Ordered because I hurt my neck and needed a heating pad. This has not been worth the time it has taken getting it replaced multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: I’m hoping the product I received is simply defective... it barely gets warm, even on the highest setting. The head is located only in one small place as well rather than throughout the neck wrap. Magnetic closure is crappy and doesn’t work either😩 avoid and spend a little more money on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: arett

customer_reviews.title: Could be hotter
customer_reviews.text: Really nice with the magnet keeping it around your shoulders, and great quality--because of this purchase, I also bought the PureRelief XL regular heating pad (which is 5 stars!)--just wish this one got a bit hotter, as without a weight on your shoulders it's hard to get the relief I need. Also doesn't really have much heating in the collar section, which was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I live this brand, have two of their heating pads I loved so thought I would get this one as well. I was excited for it to arrive but disappointed as the size is much smaller than what is shown in the photos. It just about wraps around the neck, magnetic closure doesn’t work well at all and pad does not drape down upper back as pictured It just hits the uppers shoulders. Maybe if it came in different sizes it would be more effective? Definitely do not recommend for a man or someone with broad shoulders. As I mentioned I love this brand but I am sadly very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: I've very disappointed with the lack of performance from this
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my neck and I purchased this item to relieve discomfort after doing excercises for this ailment.BUT the heating pad didn't get warm at all let alone hot. I sat and waited and waited and waited and it never became hot.I've very disappointed with the lack of performance from this item
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Vilson

customer_reviews.title: Made my mom very happy ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Just found out my mom (46) has had fibromyalgia for the last 30 years, undiagnosed. It makes so much sense. Got her this for Christmas and as soon as present giving was over she plugged it in, curled up on the couch and took a nap, smiling in her sleep. Made my heart full. She now keeps it at her bedside. (She gets a lot of tension in her neck and stress knots that have to be massaged out at the chiropractor or she gets migraines). She's hard to buy for. This was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: It is not for men
customer_reviews.text: It is not for men! Not big enough to stay on shoulders. Very low power at 55 watts (they intentionally do not mention this in description). Their other heating pad is excellent at 180 watts power.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed all around!
customer_reviews.text: On the highest setting this only got up to 94 degrees, no where near the 140 it’s supposed to. The thermometer I used is also meant to measure the temp of objects not just people so I know it’s correct. Aside from the fact that it just doesn’t work, the magnet closure was even weaker than the heat! Wouldn’t stay closed at all. The moist heat option is simply to wet the hot pad down which is pretty gross in my opinion. Usually they have a little insert that you moisten to put inside the hot pad which seems much more comfortable to me then putting a wet pad directly on me.
customer_reviews.author: Partyof5

customer_reviews.title: Rotator cuff injuries
customer_reviews.text: I got this to provide nighttime relief for rotator cuff pain. Sure, it heats up. Might be good if you used it while in an upright position. But it is not comfortable when you're prone, due to those thick and weighted edges. Even more irritating is that there's evidently an electrical malfunction in mine now, after <2 month's use. I have to repeatedly unplug and replug to get it to work for more than a few minutes. Shopping for a different heating pad now, hoping to find a more comfortable and reliable one.
customer_reviews.author: Myra A. Mason

customer_reviews.title: To small for me
customer_reviews.text: Had to return today. 1st of all had a really strong chemical order when 1st received. I aired it out for 3 days & nights. It was a lot better but still had some smell. 2nd it didn't heat up very well. Not even on the HOT button. 3rd coverage of my shoulders wasn't enough to help that much. I had problem trying to close around my neck. Overall product was to small/short for me. Yes I am a plus size. But never had a problem with size b4 on a wrap around heating pad ??? Thank U
customer_reviews.author: Angie7941

customer_reviews.title: Pure relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought a shoulder massager because of how tight my shoulders would get. Mistake. I SHOULD have bought this product first. The pad heats up quickly and the magnet clasp keeps the pad wrapped securely around your shoulders. The cord is long enough you're not crouched by an outlet, and the remote is far enough away from the pad that you can hold it in your hands comfortably. I loved this product so much I bought their larger blanket version for my fiance, who is constantly cold. She hasn't tried it yet but I feel confident in the product and the design
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my!! This is wonderful! I have problems with rheumatoid arthritis and this heating pad has been a pure joy. The exterior is a microfiber plush, but it is also weighted around the outside edge. There is also a magnet in the front to hold the heating pad on your shoulders better. If my whole shoulders are not the issue, then just use on one shoulder or the other, either way is super comfortable. I also like that there is a bag for storing, since I use my heating pad at home and at work. Would recommend over and over.
customer_reviews.author: April Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Just Love It!
customer_reviews.text: On my, relief! I have a back and neck condition and for the past 20 years, I have struggled with the heating pad. I finally had enough and got this. Very happy I did! It fits where I need the warmth and I do not have to try to bend a regular heating pad to fit a contoured area. Works well and love the carry case that I can hang right by my bed. A closure would take this over the top, but I love it as it is!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Very short and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. I chose this heating pad because of the turtle neck like cuff over length to help with my neck pain but that area does not get very hot. I wish I had gotten a longer one because the neck area does nothing and the length of this is very short and the width is not much better, hardly covering my shoulders and I’m a petite 5 foot 110 lb person making it pretty much useless except maybe laving it across my stomach when I have cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: Seem well made, soft fabric, strong magnet to hold it on your neck... just not as hot as I would like. I have found that if I put a fleece jacket or light shawl over it then the heat radiated better. It works to relieve tension while working long hours on a computer. Would not do much good as therapy for an injury.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C Calcara

customer_reviews.title: May be more appropriate for a tired, worn-out toddler in your life
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this in the mail today and within the hour was processing my return. I didn't even proceed as far as turning it on! The thing is so freaking small, I couldn't get it to reach around my neck or to my shoulders, and I'm a small 5ft 3in, but do have broad shoulders for my size. This was supposed to replace a similar one I had made by Sunbeam... I had it for 6 years and it died. I'll gladly return to Sunbeam after this.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for quite awhile! I am in love with the quality and comfort! I use it for everything I need too, I am pregnant and I can't wait to use it to help with labor! It heats up so well and the settings are perfect, I love the shut off after 2 hours too because sometimes I need to fall asleep with it because of my discomfort. Would definitely recommend! I spent a lot of time reading reviews and I decided on this one and I'm so glad I did, best choice ever!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Reneè Seipp

customer_reviews.title: A perfect product to assist in the healing process after neck surgery.
customer_reviews.text: This a life saver! I just had a double disc replacement on C5,6 and 7. The cold weather has been causing severe pain and spasms in my arms and hands. This pad allows me to counter many of the effects of the cold on the new implants as I heal up. I haven't found any type of magnets in it yet that would keep it closed around my neck but it drapes over and stays fairly well. I'm sure this will help with the healing process.
customer_reviews.author: Easy's Cycles & More

customer_reviews.title: Really like except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice heating pad for the neck and shoulder blade area. For moist heat, just spray water it on the fabric with a spray bottle or wipe on with a wet towel. The only thing I didn't like were the packets of pebbles or little stones (whatever you want to call them) sewn in around the edges (for weight I'm assuming). This was uncomfortable if you have a backrest because you can feel them through the fabric. I ended up cutting them out and now the heating pad is perfect. If you choose to do so, be careful not to cut out the magnets that hold the neck areas together.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Steinhauser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great heating pad! Comfortable and convenient. I used it several times a week for neck pain from arthritis - and even traveled with it. After almost two years it stopped working, but I emailed the company since it had a five year warranty. They were so helpful and prompt. I had a new one delivered to me nine days after I contacted them.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough for chronic pain.
customer_reviews.text: The good news it got hotter than a previous brand I bought to save money. The bad news it didn't feel like 140° either. I had someone else feel it to make sure and she said she could tell it was on, but it wasn't hot. I have chronic pain and need my heating pads really really hot. If you need something super hot, this isn't it. That being said if you need something that is just above warm. You will enjoy it. It doesn't meet my personal need, but you may enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Walker

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use. Nice fabric & color. Buy it! I have neck & shoulder problems & this helps ease the pain. Very light weight too which is important when your neck is in pain.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have the back heater from this same brand and I love that too. This is just a well-made heater that is soft and feels so good for muscle relief. I use mine very often and love it. No problems. They are also kind enough to include a bag for travel or people like me that like things to have "homes". I would highly recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Spoonie32

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: It states it is to heat to 140 degrees. I've been doing PT and it is a lot more hot than this one. You have to wait abut 14 minutes for it to get warm. It does not stay well on your neck. It slides down if you move. You would do better using one that doesn't have the neck piece The one that they use at PT has a strap that is attached that goes under your chin. You may laugh but it works great. I would not recommend this unless you wanted the lower heat settings.
customer_reviews.author: SKI

customer_reviews.title: defective or really crappy product
customer_reviews.text: Had such great reviews but it doesn't even get hot. There is setting for warm, low, med, and high and the best I might get is low, and that is making sure I have only a thin t-shirt on. I thought with so many good reviews it would be good.
customer_reviews.author: laurs books

customer_reviews.title: My family fights over who will get to use this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister, when she had some severe neck pain and stiffness and was going through some physical therapy. It was just a gift meant to be a gesture of kindness at that time and I wondered if she would actually use it. She said it offered her great relief and she used it multiple times a day, her husband started using it after long days editing on the computer, my parents started to use it when they came over to babysit. It is very well made, heats up evenly, really can fit and sit comfortably on different body types. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: kristan kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Warm pad should be the name.
customer_reviews.text: The unit doesn't heat up very much even on the highest setting. It also doesn't stay closed with magnets. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Cylonathena

customer_reviews.title: This heating pad was nice and soft to the touch
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad was nice and soft to the touch, but I was disappointed that the collar piece that goes up and around the neck doesn't heat up. Not sure why they bothered making it that way if it doesn't heat up along with the rest of the pad. The whole reason I bought it was to get heat on my shoulders AND neck since I have tension in both areas. I also wish it had some more weight to it so it would sit on my shoulders better. It has a tendency to "float" above the surface of my shoulders rather than on them.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY LYNN PICKERING

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain caused by herniated neck discs
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is perfect for shoulder and neck problems. I have 2 herniated neck discs which often cause nerve pain and muscle spasms in the neck and shoulder areas. This pad heats the whole area and permits the muscles to be easily stretched relieving much of the pain. The controller has 4 settings which permits me to achieve my desired temperature. Lastly, there are magnets embedded in the neck collar which keep the pad in place while maintaining a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jack T

customer_reviews.title: Instant heat and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very good heat output and great feeling on your shoulders and neck after you put on this contoured heating pad to relieve everyday tension in your muscles around your neck and shoulders. I have been using a flat rectangular heating pad until I came across this product that's made for the shoulders and neck area. What a difference it makes. I would recommend this heating pad to anyone looking for heat applied to the shoulder & neck area without the heating pad falling off. There's also a built in magnet to hold it in place and tight around your neck to add to the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Never gets hot enough
customer_reviews.text: Even on high, it doesn't really get hot. Which is disappointing since that's what I need it to do. Other reviews mentioned a strong chemical smell... I noticed a slight smell the first time I used it, but not since. It doesn't have snaps in the front, I knew this buying it but it is a pain. I use it while I work on a computer and am constantly having to adjust it or hold it down to feel any warmth. The nice things: fabric is soft, overall shape seems to fit my body well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ritter

customer_reviews.title: A litte disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful about the usefulness of this product. The odor mentioned was NO ISSUE, no strong smell at all. However even as a tiny person 5"1', 127 lbs I found the device barely large enough. I also found it was less hot than necessary and then limited operating time resulted in constantly resetting the device. Needing both shoulders replaced as well as upper cervical stenosis the heated 'shawl' was very much anticipated but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Superwhiff

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my heating pad just recently to help with a horrible neck and shoulder pain from straining my muscles. When it came in the mail I ripped open the box like it was Christmas morning! Needless to say, I sat down and threw it around my shoulders. I could already feel some of the pains melting away after the first use. The heating pad fits great on my shoulders and the magnet closure is perfect! Thanks so much for a great product! Would definitely purchase in the future!
customer_reviews.author: M Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.text: I have cervical disc problems causing severe pain in neck and shoulders. This heating pad covers all of my problem spots, high up in neck area and drapes down a bit past my shoulder blades (I'm 5'2"). I bought this one to replacewhich isn't bad, but I was constantly fumbling with it trying to get some neck coverage. With the PureRelief Neck & Shoulder Heating Pad by Pure Enrichment I put it on, relax, and quick pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: pickyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to warm the shoulders and neck. I would have liked the neck to be a bit larger, it is a snug fit. The magnetic closure is a nice addition, but if you have a large neck may be too tight. It would be simple enough to use a safety pin. I have used it on my upper arm too by just wrapping it on one side. The body of the pad is soft and supple, the edges are filled with something that makes them heavier to help hold it in place. I loaned it to a friend who had a torn rotator cuff and he loved it too! Nice buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Power

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find this heating pad effective. I dont know if its how it sat on my shoulders. I thought it was uncomfortable and barely gave out any heat. I went back to the old stand by and it works great. I wanted to love it.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not enough heat, doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: This pad doesn't get very hot. It's ok at the highest level, but the heat drops off after a few minutes. I also don't notice any magnets on the edges at all. The pad drapes around my shoulders fairly well, but I need to hold it closed for the heat to transfer to any reasonable degree. If this pad got hotter I'd buy a clamp at the hardware store to hold it closed and in place, but since the heat level is so disappointing I'll probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Love this heat pad.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect heat pad for your neck and shoulders. It fits perfect and the magnet helps keep it in place. I tend to have very tight shoulders that give me tension headaches. This pad is perfect because of the heat displacement on the shoulders and the back of the neck. I have no complaints other than I wish I had purchased this much sooner. You'll be pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: TVgirl13

customer_reviews.title: Not warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made product but doesn't get warm enough. Also, I primarily need it for my neck and I think it's made for a bigger person since the neck part barely even touched my neck. Also, the magnetic closure is not strong enough. As soon as you move it comes unhinged. I recommend Sunbeams neck and shoulder heating pad. It's not perfect but at least it gets warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It made popping noises and started smelling like smoke.
customer_reviews.text: I got this about a year ago and hadn’t used it but a few times. The couple of times I had used it I was satisfied; however, the last time I used it, the red button kept flashing and I couldn’t change any of the settings to a lower temperature. Then it started making this popping noise and I started smelling smoke! It was scary. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the neck and shoulder heating pad. I am a student and as such spend most of the day sitting and thus often have neck and shoulder pain. I have used the heating pad for this and it helps with the muscle pain and neck tension. It heats up extremely quickly and the material is soft and comforting. I also love the different temperature setting so I can adjust based on how I am feeling or the temperature in the room. Overall a great product and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Levulis

customer_reviews.title: Stays clean, long cord, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The cord is pretty long which is convenient. It has an auto shut off function which avoids combustion and power overuse. I like the many settings for heat although I have never used a setting below high because, why would I if I want a heating pad? Cons: it was a bit pricey. It is not portable obviously unlike a microwavable bean bag or fillable water bag. It has been quite useful for my purposes and I am happy with my purchase. No issues this far 1 year later.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine S.

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m not smart enough to use a heating pad. I purchased this item a couple of years ago. It heated for a couple of minutes, then stopped heating. I put it away and forgot about until recently because I had need for it, same thing. I emailed the company and they were great to deal with, just wanted proof of purchase and sent me another one. I tried it on my sore neck and it felt wonderful for a few minutes and shut down to maybe warm. Darn, how disappointing! I give up.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately Stopped working... just broke not even 5 years old
customer_reviews.text: I have spinal stenosis a very painful condition that effect my cervical 5, 6 and T 1 disc. This wrap provides me with instant relief. Sits comfortably sitting up or lying down. Shuts off automatically in 2 hours. This is great for me because I fall asleep with it on. Almost like having a cuddly soft cat wrapped around your neck and shoulder. If you respond well to heat therapy. I would definitely RECOMMEND this product.UPDATE: Stopped working. Lasted only 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: This Company stands by their Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as I suffer from bad neck pain due to severe chronic migraines. It doesn't always close perfectly but it helps and I love it. It goes with me everywhere. Unfortunately, after a year, it started flashing and stopped working. I sent an email and another heating pad was sent within a week's time. I have another regular heating pad from this company as well. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MLJ

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed as I am someone with a bad neck and ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is soft, heavy duty seeming, however even on the highest setting it is not heating up hardly!!!!! So disappointed as I am someone with a bad neck and was looking forehead to this heating pad. Is this an electrical screw up??? I am going to return this product, or need an exchange... bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great For My Suffering Wife!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Wife Was having A Lot Of Pain In Neck And Shoulders. Dr. Recommended This Pad For Her. She Uses It At Home And Work And It Helped Her Tremendously! I Can Only Hope This Helps You If You Suffer Neck And/Or Shoulder Pain. I Would Definitely Buy Again Just To See My Wife Get relief From The Bad Pain She Was Having.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: I would think that a heating pad would not be much different from one to another but this one really is the perfect heating pad. It wraps perfectly around your neck and upper back as well as your shoulders, creating a snug but comfortable fit. It heats up quickly and to the desired level of heat. Have liked it so much that I have since recommended the product to friends and family as well. It's worth its price and would recommend it wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Guptnav

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly hot enough
customer_reviews.text: It's soft, has a magnet to keep it closed. The cord is long so you can just walk around a bit with it.. But for me it just wasn't hot enough :( sadly I have to return it. It's not going to help my neck... I'm a massage therapist. I need heat! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Clover Jené

customer_reviews.title: Low heat
customer_reviews.text: I was anxious to get this due to neck/shoulder pain and migraines. I did like that it was a generous size and soft to the touch. Unfortunately the level of heat was minimal and for me it didn’t help with pain. If you’re someone who just wants minimal heat it may work for you. I prefer more heat to penetrate a bit more. Amazon did accept my return.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Weak and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is so weak and gets mildly warm at the most. Total waste!
customer_reviews.author: Director of Education

customer_reviews.title: Heaven for pain and discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Replaces a microwavable heating pad for chronic neck and shoulder pain for my octageneric mother. No longer do we have to continually reheat the pad. It stays on her shoulders very nicely and gives her great comfort. However, it is important to watch where the cord is placed so there is no chance of tripping over it. Absolutely will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Supsy500

customer_reviews.title: The way it fits your neck and shoulders at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of needlepoint and cross stitching. This can often make my neck and shoulders stiff. This heating pad is.great for that. It has four heat settings. It has a collar that fits neatly around your neck while the remainderlays nicely on your shoulders. There's are also magnets that allow you to close it at the neck. There is an automatic 2 hour shutoff. I am very happy with this heating padand would reccomend if to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good heating pad
customer_reviews.text: I like that is has some magnetic closure to keep it wrapped around your neck it is pretty big so you do have to pull it up to get the heat where you want it if you don’t have a large neck. It is comfortable and the high heat is fine, not quite as hot as microwaving a wet towel but much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Sarouche

customer_reviews.title: Lukewarm at best
customer_reviews.text: I’m truly kicking myself for purchasing this item. The reviews were mixed but I should have believed the people who complained this item did not get warm enough. The heating element does not heat the neck piece, just the upper shoulders, and the pad doesn’t hug the neck or shoulders the way I had hoped. It doesn’t quite lay flat against the skin. The highest setting is like low on my standard heating pad.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. This did not put out a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed. I usually like the PURE products for heating pads however this one disappointed for sure. The neck park gets the most hot out of the whole item however just doesn’t seem like it’s hot enough. The shoulder part does not hardly put out any heat. And it does not rest flat against my shoulders while I am Laying in bed with it. I even double checked the pictures to make sure I was doing it right. I was excited to receive this because I suffer from bad discs on both sides of my neck and my regular heating pad wasn’t cutting it for me. Sadly, it works better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: The fabric and contour of this heating pad is beautiful. The problem is
customer_reviews.text: The fabric and contour of this heating pad is beautiful. The problem is, it never got hot even though it has four settings. I returned it as soon as we discovered the problem. I did try to unplug and reheat 3 or 4 times just to see if it would get hotter than the first attempt. I was aware that some heat pads do not get hot from other item reviews. Buyer beware. I was hoping to get one for my new son-in-law as a gift....bummer!
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new heating pad it’s amazing it has just enough weight to help the arthritis in my neck and there’s two little magnets in the front to keep it closed which is really cool in the heat is fabulous and I put it on for just a little bit and my neck feels 100% better thank you again Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews and compare all other brands before buying.
customer_reviews.text: A couple of things I didn't like was there isn't any heat on the sides of the neck, the magnetic closure doesn't stay together. I have an average size neck and it was tight using the magnetic closure which may be the reason it didn't stay closed. I liked the idea of it being weighted on the edges so it will stay in place but I am a side sleeper and it was very uncomfortable to sleep with because of the weights. If you are just setting in a chair it would be find.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: An RN’s holy grail for sore shoulders!
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse with horrible sleeping habits, this is a holy grail. My shoulders get real knotted and tight after working my 12 hour shifts back to back and sleeping in the wrong positions. I brought this to work and everyone was jealous! It’s nice and soft to the touch and gets warm to hot quickly. I’m not sure why the reviews complain of a smell because to my sensitive nose, there’s no horrible stench. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed that when I place this on my shoulders it won't stay in place as well as my old Sunbeam pad. When the magnet closure is together I fell like it is choking me. It would work well on a child probably, someone really small. For the price it should not have been so small.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: It does heat
customer_reviews.text: After going through several reviews bout the heat on this and it didn't get hot I decided to purchase anyway. I have a tank top on and it wrapped around my shoulders. It is fine heat wise. Most heating pads do not stay at the hot temperature for the entire time you have it on. It does lessen. If it does I just turned it off n turned it back on and got the heat back. All in all laying on my bed with pillow behind my back it does what my other hot heating pad did plus locks around the front also. I would recommend for 32.00.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpaws

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic close on the neck is so helpful.
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is so comfortable and helps with stiffness and sore muscles. I have degenerative disk disease and problems with stress in neck and shoulders. It has been very comforting. The long cord and magnetic closure on the neck make it very comfortable to wear. Thank you for an excellent product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: mary warner

customer_reviews.title: great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick and soft heating pad for neck and shoulders. Has a round border sewn in all around that feels like some kind of BBs inside. This helps a lot in holding the pad in place around your neck. Multiple settings and high gets really hot. Fits 6 ft tall x 220 lb man perfect. Dont know what they are calling magnets, but there are none. Unless they are referring to the border.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Got it for the gf, but I like to steal it
customer_reviews.text: I am not the primary user of this device. My girlfriend is a lizard or vampire or something that doesn’t produce body heat. I actually think that’s why she keeps me around. At any rate, I risked becoming obsolete by allowing this into our apartment and it’s pretty comfy. Not nasty edges like you often get with cheap ones. It’s like one of those soft couch blankets but much smaller and heated.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: The design is great and the controls are nice but it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this. The design is great and the controls are nice but it does not get hot enough. "High" feels like "Low". I cannot even imagine what the "Low" setting feels like. Wanted to return, but the item is NOT returnable and I am a prime member. Wish I knew that before. Update: 1-27-17- Customer service quickly contacted me to resolve the issue after seeing my review. They were kind and supportive. I am very appreciative of them quickly contacting me and offering a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eases the Pain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this neck and shoulder heating pad because I suffer from severe neck and shoulder pain. I spray it with a spray water bottle to get moist heat and it does help ease my constant chronic pain. I did not give it a 5 star review because it states that it is supposed to have a magnetic front closure but mine does not! I either have to hold it shut or wrap a scarf around it to hold it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Scotlandfog

customer_reviews.title: Best.Purchase.EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews, but this has to be the best purchase I have made in a long time. Temp range is fantastic, it’s super soft, magnets work great to keep it in place and it really is infinitely better than trying to use a regular heating pad like I have been for way too long.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K. Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heating pad.
customer_reviews.text: The front has a magnetic closure to help keep it in place! This is not just for your shoulders -- the shape makes it perfect for wrapping around your belly or back very easily, and it's also great for laps. The edges are slightly weighted, which just feels amazing on your neck, and it's soft all over. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Does not get very warm
customer_reviews.text: I loved the coverage of the neck and shoulders with this heating pad. It looks to be well made and the material is very soft. I just wish there was more heat. It never gets more than warm. I think it would be more therapeutic if there was a greater range in temperature. Somewhat disappointing for this otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Very small! did not even extend to cover my shoulders, and I have a pretty small frame. Highest heat setting was just warm. No therapeutic effect on my shoulder bursitis. A waste of money, this is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck heating pad. I carry most of my tension in my neck and shoulders. This is excellent for de-stressing after a long day. It’s convenient and lightweight enough to wear while I’m reading or watching TV. My only suggestion would be to add just a bit more weight to sit a little more snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Canney

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the neck and shoulder pad along with the XL back pad last year. The back pad worked like a champ, large and very comfortable, however the neck and shoulder pad didn't work properly. One year later my wife pulls out the neck and shoulder warmer to use on her stained neck, and we remembered it didn't work. Sent an email to Pure Enrichment, and had a new unit 4 days later. Love companies that stand behind their products. Can only give 4 stars because the first heating pad didn't work at all, but I would recommend and purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Great while it worked...after following instruction to a “T” on both pad they now flash the “F” code once plugged in. I have verified and I am using the correct chord with each pad, I washed and dried prince directions, made sure they were dry before plugging them in etc. etc. very disappointing because I didn’t plan on having to buy a new one on a regular basis. I’ll be looking for another brand that’s more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: DGG

customer_reviews.title: Great for cramps
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this for her cramps and it helps. "I just receives my Pure Enrichment Heating Pad XXL from Amazon. I found a card in there that said if I rate the heating pad on a scale of 1-5 you would send me a free hot/cold pack. My scale rating is a 5 we like the unit very much so far. My only thought is that the temp. setting at #6 could be a little warmer."
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product, but I'm a big man and it just was not big enough to go around my neck and for the magnets to stick together! So I returned it and bought the XXL heating pad instead. The customer service was very good to me and actually sent me a small gift for my trouble. I've bought 3 of these heating pads in the past and HAVE NEVER HAD A PROBLEM WITH THEM! well worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: joseph sexton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Purerelief neck and shoulder heating pad. I have chronic headaches and migraines that usually start as tension in my neck. This heating pad fits perfectly up my neck and around my shoulders....exactly where I need it. I've used it several times already and it has provided me with relief. The outside fabric is very soft and luxurious and feels great against your skin. The travel bag is also a nice convenience, since I do take it with me whenever I travel. I would definitely recommend this product. It's made me feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Help!  We Santa Claus types need X-Large!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many rotator cuff surgeries & I reckoned this heating pad would be good. It heats well and supplies a comforting balance of heat where needed. My only criticism (hence 4 stars), is that while it does conform to the shoulders for people with medium builds, it falls short for broader shouldered fellas like me. The dimensions of this unit is 14" X 22". There needs to be an X-Large option based on the dimensions of perhaps, 18" X 26" or 28"? I can't even bring the neck magnets together, because I have a size 18" neck. How about it, PureRelief?
customer_reviews.author: Ol' St. Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s very comfortable and exactly what I needed. After a visit to a Massage Specialist and two visits to a Chiropractor I was having a lot of pain. We had a long heating pad but it was difficult to get the heat where I needed it. After just 2 days of using this Pure Enrichment Heating Pad I’m much better. It works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: 1st use today, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I love how it fits my neck. I suffer from stress in my shoulder and heat always helps. It’s made to fit my neck and shoulders perfect. It cuts off after 2 hours. Don’t think I’ll need that but nice to know if I ever forget to turn it off. I own a flat heating pad and I like this one so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Love my new comfortable heating pad
customer_reviews.text: Great heating pad for my neck and shoulders. I have a bit of arthritis in my lower neck and Ive tried using regular heating pads but they are uncomfortable. This one fits perfect and so far it has provided consistent heat and gives me the ability to give heat to the affected area. I like that it is easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Enrichment's Neck and Shoulder heating pad is enriching!
customer_reviews.text: I received my neck/shoulder heating pad a few days ago and I am so pleased. I have struggled with a hot/wet heating pad that I bought at CVS a couple of years ago. It was so stiff and the outer wrap was so cheap. I have bulging and herniated disks in my neck and this pad is a miracle to use. I love the magnets that hold it in place. The fabric is soft and colorful. The Auto off timer is an added bonus. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful to help ease the pain in my neck
customer_reviews.text: I give this heating pad a 5 out of 5. It is wonderful to help ease the pain in my neck. It has a good range of heat options, the ability to be used wet or dry, a long cord, it's machine washable, and has an auto shut off feature after 2 hours. I've been using this every day since I received it and it does wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: having the extension for the back of the neck gives me the relief I need quickly Usually after 15 minutes I am good to continue my activities
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the PureRelief neck and shoulder heating pad and have used it a couple of time. I do a lot of quilting an crocheting that causes me to look down a lot and I get a lot of pain in my neck. With this pad, having the extension for the back of the neck gives me the relief I need quickly Usually after 15 minutes I am good to continue my activities. With my regular heating pad I was rolling it up to get to the back of the neck and it never seemed to relieve the muscle pain. The PureRelief is just what I have been looking for. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Kusmier

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this product. Cord is in a weird spot, is too short and the control hard to reach. Heating pad barely goes around my neck (I am a small woman) and it doesn't get very hot. If I pull it tight and hold it I feel a little more heat. Their oversized heating pad is awesome but this product is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: okistampqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great heating pad that stays wrapped around your neck!
customer_reviews.text: If you want the dependable performance of a digital controlled rectangular heating pad, but hate that those are hard to fit and hold onto your neck, this is the pad to get. It works exactly like the rectangular ones, has the same controls, gets just as comfortably warm, but it wraps around your neck and shoulders and stays there. Pure relief is definitely the right name for this when you have a stiff neck because that soothing warmth feels good and you don't have to fight to keep the thing on your shoulders. It looks well made and just feels great - I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, healing heat
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is perfect for my neck and shoulder pain. I sit at a computer all day and often have tension that runs through my shoulders and neck, causing severe headaches. The way this is designed covers the tension areas with a nice heat that relaxes my muscles and gives non-medication relief to my headache.
customer_reviews.author: Vero Gal

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, Superior Service
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the quality of the product, my wife has back pain and she loves it. But what really sets this company apart is the length to which they stand behind their products. We had the XL heating pad and neck/shoulder pad both stop working recently. I bought them in December 2016. I contacted customer support, gave them some info and within a couple of days I had two new heating pads shipped to my doorstep. I did not even have to return the old ones. And this isn't the first time they've replaced a product for me. They're awesome and I think they pretty much have customers for life right here 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Dave F

customer_reviews.title: Contoured Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic shoulder stiffness and have been treating it with regular chiropractor & massage visits along with a standard square heating pad. I purchased this heating pad as it looked to conform around the shoulder, something my standard heating pad would not do. Within minutes of my first use, I felt relief and had mobility I typically only have after the chiro/massage. The materials appear of high quality and the pad is weighted to stay put on the neck and shoulders. I’m thoroughly pleased with my purchase and should have bought this many months ago! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DRK

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this on my sore neck. I worked my way from low setting to high. It felt good for about 10 minutes. Now high setting feels like the low setting. The heat only comes from a tiny section. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Turdo

product_meta.title: Pure Enrichment PureRelief Neck and Shoulder Heating Pad (Turquoise Blue) - Fast-Heating Technology with Magnetic Neck Closure, 4 Heat Settings, Moist Heat Therapy Option and Convenient Storage Bag
feature_bullets: CONTOURED FOR NECK & SHOULDERS: Perfectly contoured to drape comfortably around your neck and shoulders.
ULTRA-SOFT MICROMINK: Smooth micromink fibers provide maximum comfort for daily use.
FAST-HEATING: Heats in seconds to provide fast, temporary pain relief to sore, aching muscles. Heat ranges from 110℉ (warm setting) to 140℉ (high setting).
MOIST HEAT OPTION: Safely use for moist or dry heat therapy.
5 YEAR WARRANTY: Your satisfaction is guaranteed thanks to our industry-leading warranty program.
